Personality.PersonalityNodeDef.label: purity
Personality.PersonalityNodeDef.highDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} isn't necessarily virginal, but {PAWN_pronoun} tends to be reserved when it comes to lovin'. {PAWN_pronoun} is less likely to do lovin' casually or to stray from {PAWN_possessive} partner.
Personality.PersonalityNodeDef.lowDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} will try anything once. {PAWN_pronoun} has a hard time resisting lovin' opportunities.
